動物用藥品名稱: 生化新城雞瘟、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防新城雞瘟及傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: HIS VACCINE CONTAINS LASOTA STRAIN OF NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUSAND INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS, MASSACHUSETTS TYPE (HOLLANDSTRAIN). THE EMBRYONATED CHICKEN EGGS USED IN THE PRODUCTIONWERE OBTAINED FROM SPECIFIC PATHOGEN FREE (SPF) FLOCKS.
